name: Crashy Boulders (Cypor, Fireskelet)
description:
Action platformer made by Cyporkador and Fireskelet (https://itch.io/profile/fireskelet) for Mini Jam 63: Future.

Controls:
- Arrow Keys to move
- Space to jump/double jump
- M to mute
- Esc to pause

Music from: https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/platformer2/
